/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of brown and beige, standing tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. Cars and trucks are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and activity in the city. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the earthy tones of the buildings and vehicles.
